verses.name: Psalms 31:1
verses.text: In thee, O Lord, do I put my trust; let me never be ashamed: deliver me in thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 31:2
verses.text: Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:3
verses.text: For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name’s sake lead me, and guide me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:4
verses.text: Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me: for thou art my strength.

verses.name: Psalms 31:5
verses.text: Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O Lord God of truth.

verses.name: Psalms 31:6
verses.text: I have hated them that regard lying vanities: but I trust in the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 31:7
verses.text: I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy: for thou hast considered my trouble; thou hast known my soul in adversities;

verses.name: Psalms 31:8
verses.text: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.

verses.name: Psalms 31:9
verses.text: Have mercy upon me, O Lord, for I am in trouble: mine eye is consumed with grief, yea, my soul and my belly.

verses.name: Psalms 31:10
verses.text: For my life is spent with grief, and my years with sighing: my strength faileth because of mine iniquity, and my bones are consumed.

verses.name: Psalms 31:11
verses.text: I was a reproach among all mine enemies, but especially among my neighbours, and a fear to mine acquaintance: they that did see me without fled from me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:12
verses.text: I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind: I am like a broken vessel.

verses.name: Psalms 31:13
verses.text: For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.

verses.name: Psalms 31:14
verses.text: But I trusted in thee, O Lord: I said, Thou art my God.

verses.name: Psalms 31:15
verses.text: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.

verses.name: Psalms 31:16
verses.text: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies’ sake.

verses.name: Psalms 31:17
verses.text: Let me not be ashamed, O Lord; for I have called upon thee: let the wicked be ashamed, and let them be silent in the grave.

verses.name: Psalms 31:18
verses.text: Let the lying lips be put to silence; which speak grievous things proudly and contemptuously against the righteous.

verses.name: Psalms 31:19
verses.text: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!

verses.name: Psalms 31:20
verses.text: Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.

verses.name: Psalms 31:21
verses.text: Blessed be the Lord: for he hath shewed me his marvellous kindness in a strong city.

verses.name: Psalms 31:22
verses.text: For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 31:23
verses.text: O love the Lord, all ye his saints: for the Lord preserveth the faithful, and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer.

verses.name: Psalms 31:24
verses.text: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.
